item.title: Vance Slams Democrats, Media For ‘Encouraging Crazy People’ To ‘Commit Violence’
item.description: 'Political violence has gotten out of control in this country. We've got to stop it. We've got to condemn it. And that starts, unfortunately, at the v...

item.title: Media, Dems Won’t Apologize For Comparing ICE To Gestapo After Attack Targeting Agents
item.description: Democrats declined to apologize for comparing ICE to the Gestapo in the wake of a deadly attack on an ICE facility in Texas.

item.title: The American Left Is Resurrecting The Bloody Legacy Of John Brown
item.description: We should take the left’s invocation of John Brown seriously. It’s a call to murder anyone who opposes their agenda.

item.title: Here’s Proof Democrats Are Lying About Protecting Jimmy Kimmel Over ‘Free Speech’
item.description: Democrats have exactly zero credibility to stand on when attacking Chairman Carr for supposedly politicizing the FCC.

item.title: Can Erika Kirk’s Influence Help Women To ‘Woman Up?’
item.description: As Erika Kirk takes the helm at Turning Point, many have suggested she could do for young women what her husband has done for young men.
